Description: In celebration of their 50th anniversary, Ibishu built special anniversary models for all their vehicles. The flagship Pessima had a special 'Anniversary Trim' based off of the ZX. The Anniversary models all with special royal green paint, a beige interior, 'Ibishu Suprema' wheels, and a small power boost. (AUTOMATIC VERSION- This was the only time the ZX was also offered with an automatic transmission.)
